subject: Only 2 Hours left on ebay---$125 for custom box
author: Urkel23
full_text:
http://www.ebay.com/itm/Steves-Ghost-Box-Spirit-Communicator-RTSC-EVP-/140651849197?pt=LH_DefaultDomain_0&hash=item20bf80e5ed


After this, i will most likely not be selling anymore for a while.  If anybody is interested in a custom built and fully adjustable ghost box, here is that chance to get one.  

It's only slightly more money than a hacked box and a lot less than a minibox.  I also fine tune them and hand make each and every device, also they are fully tested.

-Steve H.
